statements: SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_count FROM drivers WHERE delivery_count > 10;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_covered FROM drivers WHERE distance_covered < 50.0;
SELECT * FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, start_location FROM drivers WHERE end_location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_count FROM drivers WHERE distance_covered > 100 ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT driver_name, end_location FROM drivers WHERE delivery_count >= 10 AND start_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY end_location DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, delivery_count FROM drivers WHERE distance_covered <= 50 OR driver_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY driver_id;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_covered FROM drivers WHERE delivery_count < 5 AND (start_location LIKE '%home%' OR end_location LIKE '%office%') ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT id, driver_id, route FROM delivery_routes WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT id, route, distance FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_status = 'completed';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM delivery_history WHERE driver_id = 2 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC, delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT id, route, driver_id FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT driver_id, delivery_date, route_id FROM delivery_history WHERE driver_id = 123 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY driver_id HAVING AVG(distance) > 10;
SELECT * FROM delivery_data ORDER BY delivery_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, delivery_address FROM delivery_data WHERE delivery_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT delivery_id, driver_id, delivery_address FROM delivery_data WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM driver_performance ORDER BY total_deliveries DESC, average_delivery_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, total_deliveries FROM driver_performance WHERE total_deliveries > 10;
SELECT * FROM delivery_data WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT delivery_address, delivery_time FROM delivery_data WHERE delivery_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT driver_id, count(*) as total_deliveries FROM delivery_data GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, JSONB_OBJECT_KEYS(route_details) AS route_keys FROM driver_routes WHERE driver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT driver_id, (COALESCE(average_delivery_time, '0 hours') + interval '2 hours') AS adjusted_delivery_time FROM driver_performance WHERE total_deliveries > 10 ORDER BY adjusted_delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_phone FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time, delivery_address FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_status FROM drivers INNER JOIN delivery_history ON drivers.driver_id = delivery_history.driver_id WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_phone FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_address FROM drivers JOIN deliveries ON drivers.driver_id = deliveries.driver_id;
SELECT route_id, route_details FROM routes WHERE driver_id = 2 AND route_details LIKE '%highway%';
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers WHERE driver_rating > 4.5;
SELECT route_id, route_date, route_distance FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_address FROM delivery_orders WHERE order_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND order_timestamp <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries, total_distance_covered FROM driver_performance WHERE completed_deliveries > 10 ORDER BY total_distance_covered DESC;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, order_timestamp, order_address FROM delivery_orders WHERE order_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, route_distance, route_duration FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_date = '2022-07-15' ORDER BY route_distance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_history WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY delivery_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries, total_distance_covered, average_rating FROM driver_performance WHERE total_distance_covered >= 500 ORDER BY completed_deliveries DESC LIMIT 5;
